Our experienced team of event planners and catering staff will plan a memorable event. We will take care of everything from tickets to catering for Company Picnics, Employee Appreciation Days, Evening Events, Youth Groups, Small Groups, School Groups, Birthday Parties or Family Reunions. We do the Work â€“ You Have the Fun! CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFO: $64.99 as low as $40 GROUPS OF 15+ Group tickets of 15-49, must visit on same date to use these tickets. Weekday ticket valid Monday through Friday only, not Saturdays, Sundays or Holidays. Please check Rapids Operating Calendar for operating hours. Ticket includes all day admission to Rapids Water Park, children 2 and under Free. WEEKDAY WEEKENDS & HOLIDAYS Starting at $45.99 Per Person 50 OR MORE INCLUDES FOOD! A catered option is available for Groups of 50 or more and includes: All-day admission with an all-you-can-eat buffet meal served in our private picnic pavilions. Please check Rapids Operating Calendar for operating hours. Fill out the form below for Group Sales Department to contact you or Call the Rapidsâ€™ Group Sales Department at (561) 848-6272. CONTACT US Group Outings At Rapids Waterpark Our team will be contacted for all interests in booking a group event Name (Required) First Last Email (Required) Phone (Required) Group Name or Organization Name (Required) First Group Information (Required) Social Event School/Camp Event Corporate Event Family Event Other Can you please note what type of event you are looking to have at our park? Event Date (Required) MM slash DD slash YYYY Number of Guests (Required) Add/Upload Tax-Exempt Form (If possible) Max. file size: 50 MB. Additional Comments Comments This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. The park features 40 slides and attractions on more than 35 acres. A visit to Rapids includes a full day of fun from the thrills of the seven story slide tower to the peaceful calm current of the lazy river. There are plenty of lounge chairs to relax as well as in-park private picnic pavilions to host company events, family reunions, school groups, camps and more. The Rapids team includes an in-house catering department for special events. About Us CLOSED FOR 2025 SEASON (573) 880-5515 Buy Tickets Online Home About Us Rates & Hours Season Passes Rules & Regulations Concessions Birthday Parties Special Events & Rentals Frequently Asked Questions Join Our Team Contact Us (573) 880-5515 (573) 880-5515 Open Daily 11am - 6pm Buy Tickets Online About Us Welcome to River Rapids Waterpark! River Rapids Waterpark began construction in April of 2018 and celebrated opening day in the summer of 2019 in the Ste. Genevieve County Community Center complex. This waterpark is the largest in the area, and features a wide array of attractions for people of all ages, from daring water slides to a rock climbing wall to a lazy river and beyond! The goal of our waterpark is to provide a place for families to relax and have some fun in a creative and safe environment. Being close to the Community Center, visitors have the benefit of the entire campus, and we hope that our River Rapids Waterpark visitors will come back often to enjoy the entire facility! Our Leadership Team Brad Arnold Executive Director EMAIL Bryan Gegg Sports & Fitness Director EMAIL Joann Luttrell Office manager EMAIL Stephanie Buehler Recreation & Aqautics Supervisor EMAIL Have a question? Check out our FAQ page for common stuff, or contact us for anything you might need. Weâ€™re here to help make sure your experience at River Rapids Waterpark is as fantastic as it can be! Â© Ste. Genevieve County Community Center Powered by B&B Media

Join Our Team CLOSED FOR 2025 SEASON (573) 880-5515 Buy Tickets Online Home About Us Rates & Hours Season Passes Rules & Regulations Concessions Birthday Parties Special Events & Rentals Frequently Asked Questions Join Our Team Contact Us (573) 880-5515 (573) 880-5515 Open Daily 11am - 6pm Buy Tickets Online Join Our Team Be A Part of the Fun! It takes a lot of work to keep a great place like River Rapids Waterpark up and running. From cordial customer service to lifeguards, maintenance and beyond, our crew works hard every day to keep this great place shipshape! We offer the following perks while employed: Free membership to waterpark & Community Center One Free Food Item each shift Total Hours Worked Raises Competitive Pay Plus More! Thinking about joining our team? You can stop by the Ste. Genevieve County Community Center main office for an application, or simply download a PDF copy here . Want to quickly apply?Â  Click this link. You can bring your completed application by the SGCCC office during regular hours or email Bryan Gegg at bgegg@sgccc.com your resume or completed application. There is a brief list of positions below. Positions shown may or may not be currently hiring, but feel free to apply. Thanks! Lifeguard & Dispatch Lifeguards are responsible for surveying a body of water and conducting rescues to help weak or injured swimmers get to safety. Dispatchers enforce water slide rules and proper rider position. No prior certification needed. River Rapids Waterpark trains and certifies all staff members through Starguard -certification standards. Must be at least 15. Concessions & Admissions Staff Concession workers prepare food orders, operate cash register and process payments, and maintain sanitary standards in the concession area. Admission workers greet patrons, operate cash register and process payments & assist with park cleanliness. Must be at least 15. Maintenance & Custodial Staff Maintenance workers performs routine maintenance and cleaning of the waterpark. Custodian workers are responsible for maintaining the cleanliness of the waterpark. Â© Ste. Genevieve County Community Center Powered by B&B Media

Go Karts are not included in any wristband special. Closed toe shoes must be worn when operating a go kart . Waterpark: All Day Admission: Starting rate of $19 (daily rates change daily-check calendar below for daily rate) *Convenience fee of 3.5 % for any credit/debit card use Daily Waterpark Rates Calendar Ride Upgrade Wristband (Unlimited Amusement Park Rides) *ONLY available with Waterpark purchase*: $25 Toddler Rate (Up to 42" tall): $5 off daily rate Dry Spectators: $5 off daily rate Lockers: Cash $10 (+ $10 deposit refunded upon key return) *Convenience fee of 3.5 % for any credit/debit card use Splash Night Friday Nights Only: Pricing on Calendar OUR POLICY: **Closing time for Splash Nights can vary. Please check our website and social media pages (Facebook/Instagram) for daily updates. Runaway Rapid Family Waterpark Policy: All waterpark purchases are non-refundable. No purchases online can be refunded. In the event the waterpark closes early due to weather, we will provide passes that can be used for another day at no additional charge. You should visit the ticket booth on the day the park is closing or email proof of purchase to receive passes to marketing@keansburgamusement park.com. Waterpark tickets can be purchased at the waterpark the day of your visit or ahead of time online (tickets sent to email). Tickets can be used for our weekday warrior special or regular 3 hour admission. Tickets do not expire. We recommend arriving at the park before 12:00pm to guarantee your three hours. Closing time varies and is posted on our Facebook and Instagram every day. Splash night discount bands start an hour and a half before the park closes and can only be purchased at the park ticket booth the day of your visit. * Price includes NJ Sales Tax on any Amusement Park ticket purchase including Combo Packages. ** Closing time varies for Runaway Rapids water park and is dependent upon park occupancy and/or buy-out events. Please call 732-495-5241 for details on Runaway Rapids closing times from Memorial Day to Labor Day. Otherwise call 732-495-1400 for additional information. JOIN THE CLUB! Sweet deals. Awesome offers and special offers a click away. Î” "Wonderful and beautiful day, great food, great water park, and enjoyed the arcade. This was a birthday celebration for my daughter and her father.We love Keansburg." April Dockery "If your in jersey, one of the nostalgic favorites you have to visit is keansburg! Simple classic family fun, rides, food, arcade and the beach that won't break the bank." KJ "Good place for kids, teens, and all. They have plenty of rides for young kids as well as adults. Plenty of places to grab a snack and drinks. Plenty of parking available nearby. Good place to spend a few hours with the kids/ friends/ family."" Mital Shah "Got the weekday pass. It was worth it. My son had a ball. A full day of fun for one price. Water park and amusement park."
